abstract: Roosevelt and Adm assailed for defense preparation failures; Col L P Ayres' statistics cited; Willkie understanding of problem lauded, ed
snippet: Mr. Roosevelt has made many dramatic gestures and speeches about defense, and has no doubt been doing his utmost to get defense as fast as possible. He has repeatedly asked for, and received, tremendous appropriations....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Roosevelt has made many dramatic gestures and speeches about defense, and has no doubt been doing his utmost to get defense as fast as possible. He has repeatedly asked for, and received, tremendous appropriations.
